title: K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit 2.5.0 x64 (64-bit)
description:
Copied from Codec Guide Homepage:


K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit

This is a bundle of 64-bit DirectShow filters that can be used together with 64-bit players, such as Vista Media Center.
This pack can co-exist without problems with the regular (32-bit) K-Lite Codec Pack.

The 64-bit versions of Windows can run 32-bit software perfectly fine.
So it is recommended to use the regular K-Lite Codec Pack when possible.
That one contains more, better and faster decoders.
You only need 64-bit filters for use with 64-bit applications.

Works on 64-bit versions of Windows XP/2003/Vista/Seven.


Contents of version 2.5.0:


* ffdshow [revision 3028]

* AC3Filter [version 1.61b]

* AC3File [version 0.6b]

* Haali Media Splitter [version 1.9.63.13]

* MP4 splitter (Gabest) [version 1.2.1160.0]

* FLV splitter (Gabest) [version 1.2.1160.0]

* RealMedia splitter (Gabest) [version 1.2.1160.0]

* MPEG splitter (Gabest) [version 1.2.1164.0]

* CDXA Reader (Gabest) [version 1.2.1160.0]

* DirectVobSub [version 2.37]

* Codec Tweak Tool [version 3.0.0]

* GraphStudio [version 0.3.2.0]


Works on 64-bit versions of Windows XP/2003/Vista/Seven.



Changelog:
